body:
Dear group,

Our University needs a good radiometric CCD camera to make a visual
comparison between physical scale model shots and images rendered in
Radiance. Also we'd like to undertake some measurements of
irradiance/illuminance inside the scale model under artificial skies.

So I need your suggestions concerning what camera to choose.
At the current moment I keep an eye on SBIG ST-8XMEI and ProMetric 1400/1600
series. What else can you recommend?

--
Best Regards,
Ilya A. Zimnovich                          mailto:webmaster@audice.com
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Radiometric or photometric CCD camera models
subject: [Radiance-general] Radiometric or photometric CCD camera models
